name: Huneety
description: Operating since 2021, Huneety is a talent matching platform focusing on fast-developing economies affected by talent shortage. Our technology and skill-first approach help companies to identify and facilitate the sourcing of talented individuals. Our solutions can be used as-a-platform by HR departments, or as-a-service by Directors or Managers looking for an easy and effortless way to get the best candidates fast.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: We are Southeast Asia Talent sourcing platform connecting talents to opportunities
ShortDescription: Huneety is Southeast Asia's Talent matching platform connecting talent to opportunities accross Southeast Asia.

Highlights.name: Job Search Platform for Southeast Asia
Highlights.description: Huneety is a recruitment platform that helps job seekers find jobs in Southeast Asia [1]. This means that Huneety can be a valuable resource for people who are looking for work in this region.

Highlights.name: Streamlined Job Application Process
Highlights.description: Huneety can streamline the job application process for job seekers by screening job opportunities for them and applying to jobs on their behalf [1]. This can save job seekers time and effort in their job search.

Highlights.name: Control Over Job Search Privacy
Highlights.description: Huneety allows job seekers to control their job search privacy by letting them decide who sees their information [1]. This can be important for job seekers who are concerned about their privacy.

enhanced_description: Huneety, operating since 2021, is a talent matching platform specifically focused on fast-developing economies in Southeast Asia that are affected by talent shortage. It leverages a technology and skill-first approach to help companies identify and facilitate the sourcing of talented individuals. Huneety offers its solutions as-a-platform for HR departments, or as-a-service for Directors and Managers seeking efficient access to top candidates. The platform emphasizes streamlining the job application process for job seekers and ensuring job search privacy within the Southeast Asian market, ultimately aiming to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager productivity and confidence
competitive_advantages: Niche focus on fast-developing economies in Southeast Asia
Focus on boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
implementation_scenarios: Direct platform usage by internal HR departments
Managed service or outsourced talent sourcing for Directors and Managers
roi_benefits: Potential reduction in talent acquisition costs
